<script>
    window.renderBadge = function () {
        var ratingBadgeContainer = document.createElement("div");
        document.body.appendChild(ratingBadgeContainer);
        window.gapi.load('ratingbadge', function () {
            window.gapi.ratingbadge.render(
                ratingBadgeContainer, {
                    "merchant_id": {{Google Customer Reviews Merchant ID}},
                    "position": "{{Google Customer Reviews Badge Position}}",
                });
        });
    }
</script>
<script src="https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js?onload=renderBadge"></script>

<script>
  window.renderOptIn = function() { 
    window.gapi.load('surveyoptin', function() {
      if ({{Purchase Delivery Date}}) {
        var d = {{Purchase Delivery Date}};
      } else {
        var d = new Date();
        d.setDate(d.getDate() + {{Google Customer Reviews Survey Opt In Delivery Add Days}});
        d = new Date(d.getTime() - (d.getTimezoneOffset() * 60000 ))
          .toISOString()
          .split("T")[0];
      }
      window.gapi.surveyoptin.render({
        // REQUIRED
        "merchant_id": {{Google Customer Reviews Merchant ID}},
        "order_id": "{{Purchase ID}}",
        "email": "{{Customer Email}}",
        "delivery_country": "{{Delivery Country Code}}",
        "estimated_delivery_date": d,

        // OPTIONAL
        "opt_in_style": "{{Google Customer Reviews Survey Opt In Style}}",
        //"products": [{"gtin":"GTIN1"}, {"gtin":"GTIN2"}]
      });
    });
  }
</script>
<script src="https://apis.google.com/js/platform.js?onload=renderOptIn"></script>
